Reviews.Title: TV is decent for the price but poor sound and worse customer service
Reviews.Author: Teresa Federigi
Reviews.Content: I purchased this TV about 6 months ago, the picture is nice, but the sound is very low, I purchased a power amplifier to increase the sound. I had it just under 3 months when it completely died, wouldn't power up.  It had a 90 day warranty that requires you to pay for shipping to be repaired and also requires you to send a $25 money order for return shipping if you want it repaired, or replaced.  I would never have bought it if I knew I had to pay for a defective product. I finally received the repaired TV between 4 and 5 weeks later, I hope it doesn't die again because I'm not blowing another $50 for it.

Reviews.Title: Great TV! Can change picture size & sound of audio.
Reviews.Author: metaluna00 "Kim"
Reviews.Content: Maybe the other reviewers didn't know you can change the sound of the audio on the menu button from the remote. I like the sound of "news" which is very clear. Treble, bass and balance are on the menu including home theatre, custom and music. You can also change the size of video on your screen. Mine is in my small home office and is the perfect size for a small room. The remote is very light-weight which is surprising since it's 9" in height and 2" wide. DPI is important and this has the highest pixels available. I'm looking forward to watching DVD concerts on it. Re: high def - we have it and I can't tell the difference in that and regular cable TV but my husband says he can. We think it's a great TV and are pleased with the quality.

Reviews.Title: Very poor image for DVD
Reviews.Author: Leo
Reviews.Content: We didn't open the box until Christmas (Month after ordering).  We were not very impressed with the picture of the TV image and the slow response of the remote.  We became very disappointed when we finally put in a DVD.  The screen image is shadowed by red and blue lines across the screen.  The image is horrible.  Being busy through the holiday and then having to leave town on a business trip I now have to investigate options for returning the unit.

Reviews.Title: All in 1  Nice HDTV/DVD/SD Card /USB reader/PC Monitor/ etc..........
Reviews.Author: Mr Mike "MikNas"
Reviews.Content: This TV does it all in one unit. It even reads my Digital Camera Card, USB Flash, PC ComputerHas sleep timer, headphone jack so much MORE .Would recommend to all my friends.

Reviews.Title: Super Price for a Beautiful TV!
Reviews.Author: Thomas E. Sweeney Jr.
Reviews.Content: This TV/DVD is absolutely fantastic!!  The picture is bright and clear and the DVD combination means no extra dvd player and no extra cables/cords hanging down!  It is light and easy to hang on the wall!  I cannot get over the great price offered through Amazon and the speed with which the product was shipped to me!  I am a very happy customer and will definitely be ordering through Amazon in the near future!!

Reviews.Title: Broke down in 5 days
Reviews.Author: shimachan
Reviews.Content: Stopped all of the sudden after the 5th day. No power.  Dvd still stuck inside and cannot get it out!

Reviews.Title: Did not last very long
Reviews.Author: S. Fiorio
Reviews.Content: I bought this TV February 28, 2013 and it quit working July 7, 2013.  That's only four months for $200.  Not a very good deal.  It was a nice TV while it worked, but I won't try another coby  again.

Reviews.Title: Ok product
Reviews.Author: Vincents
Reviews.Content: The remote came with doesn't really work, or the tv's reception is defective. It takes much longer than usual for the tv to respond to the remote control. Pictures are ok, but not that great. I thought the item is little pricey comparing to the feature and quality provided. I would look for a cheaper product with better quality next time. Local Walmart stores sell better products for cheaper price.Vincents

Reviews.Title: Wow its great
Reviews.Author: Gader
Reviews.Content: I bought this to have an inexpensive TV in a room and wow its the best TV in the house i cant believe how good it really is. the picture is so crisp, its just really good. hangs on the wall really good. The directions are stupid and cant really be used to do anything,but there in 15 languages. LOL You shouldn't need them anyway. I really like it.

Reviews.Title: Great all around TV and monitor
Reviews.Author: Amazon Customer
Reviews.Content: Great tv and monitor. It has enough outputs so that you could use it as a TV, console monitor, computer monitor and picture frame all at once. I was worried about COBY name when I purchased but I have nothing negative to say about the TV or the brand. After reading countless reviews online I saw no reason not buy a new one without original boxing and glad I did!
